snippet.title: The Treasures of Montezuma 4 Trailer (PS Vita/PS3/PS4)
snippet.description:
The match 3 puzzle game The Treasures of Montezuma 4 is coming to PS Vita, PS3 and PS4 in North America and Europe on December 22, 2015. (Originally scheduled for December 8, 2015, due to technical issues it has been delayed)

The time has come to put an end once and for all to the troubling mysterious dreams that have been disturbing the young Anna, and go back to where it all began and where everything will end – to the heart of the ancient Aztec empire. Guide her on her journey through the world of The Treasures of Montezuma 4 – through the intricate levels of the ancient shrine to the portal of the other world and beyond.

The Treasures of Montezuma 4 offers even more dynamic levels, more addictive game modes, more elaborate puzzles, more vibrant graphics and more explosive over-the-top fun that is appreciated by anyone familiar with this series, which has become one of the pinnacles of the match 3 casual puzzle gamesAs you progress through the game, you will not only obtain 32 addictively challenging trophies, including the ultimate platinum trophy, but also new game modes. Story Mode will take you through 98 levels to the unforgettable final battle with fierce supernatural enemy. In Quest mode, you can embark on journey in search of a lost artifact. In the Puzzle mode, you have the opportunity to challenge 10 different puzzles.

Buy PlayStation Store Gift Cards at Amazon:
